meanings.definition: The study of hormones and the endocrine system.
meanings.sent1: In endocrinologies, scientists learn about hormones and the endocrine system.
meanings.sent2: Doctors specializing in endocrinologies help patients with hormone-related issues.
meanings.sent3: The endocrinologies class was so interesting that even the sleepy students perked up.
meanings.sent4: Her understanding of endocrinologies was like a light shining in the darkness of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on endocrinologies painted a vivid picture of the hormone interactions.

meanings.definition: The branch of medicine that deals with the endocrine glands and hormones.
meanings.sent1: Endocrinologies focuses on treating disorders of the endocrine glands.
meanings.sent2: A specialist in endocrinologies can help regulate hormone levels in the body.
meanings.sent3: The endocrinologies department at the hospital was always busy but efficient.
meanings.sent4: His knowledge of endocrinologies was a beacon of hope for patients with hormonal imbalances.
meanings.sent5: The importance of endocrinologies in maintaining health cannot be overstated.
